page.title: 06Housing.
page.content: The main types of housing in our block are,privately owned old houses, privately owned modern houses and council houses.Apart from in Uley the houses are not densely built together. The most common kind of house is the privately owned older property.Some of these old houses were once linked with the now collapsed woollen industry. The modern houses range from 1 to 20 years old.Most of the council houses were built around 1947 and are situated in the bottom half of Uley. There are two pubs in Uley.There is also a village hall which was built in 1912 and recently extended.The church was built in 1856.There were two chapels in Uley,one now sells antiques and the other is an arts centre.There are no large housing estates in our area.
